ghosts.strength: Will target only one player at a time.
ghosts.weakness: Can sometimes be heard wailing with the Parabolic Microphone.

ghosts.strength: Can initiate hunts more often.
ghosts.weakness: Crucifix effectiveness is increased to 5m against one.

ghosts.strength: Can only be seen interacting with D.O.T.S. through a camera when nobody is nearby.
ghosts.weakness: Tends to wander away less from its ghost room.

ghosts.strength: Lower temperatures allow the Hantu to move faster.
ghosts.weakness: Warmer areas slow the Hantu's movement.

ghosts.strength: Travels at faster speeds if its victim is far away.
ghosts.weakness: Cannot use its ability if the site's fuse box is off.

characteristics.text: A Jinn can't turn off the breaker. You could hide and keep the breaker on to see if the ghost will eventually turn it off.
characteristics.question: Does it turned off the breaker?

ghosts.strength: Has an increased chance to attack in the dark.
ghosts.weakness: Turning the lights on will reduce the chance of an attack.

ghosts.strength: Has quieter footsteps during a hunt.
ghosts.weakness: Produces paranormal sounds more frequently.

ghosts.strength: May leave fingerprints that disappear quicker.
ghosts.weakness: Has a small chance of leaving six-fingered handprints.

characteristics.text: There is also a rare chance that the Obake will leave a Fingerprint on the door with six fingers! So count the amount of fingers on your fingerprints!
characteristics.question: Do the fingerprints have six fingers?

ghosts.strength: Increased activity and ghost events.
ghosts.weakness: An Oni's increased activity makes them easier to find.

ghosts.strength: A flame extinguishing can cause an Onryo to attack.
ghosts.weakness: The presence of flames reduces the Onryo's ability to attack.

ghosts.strength: Looking at a Phantom will lower the player's sanity considerably.
ghosts.weakness: Taking a photo of the Phantom will cause it to briefly disappear.

ghosts.strength: Capable of throwing multiple objects at once.
ghosts.weakness: Becomes powerless with no throwables nearby.

ghosts.strength: Moves faster near electrical devices.
ghosts.weakness: Disrupts electronic equipment from further away when it hunts.

ghosts.strength: Can travel significantly faster if a player is spotted during a hunt.
ghosts.weakness: Moves very slowly when not chasing a player.

ghosts.strength: Being shy makes it more difficult to locate and obtain evidence.
ghosts.weakness: Less likely to hunt if multiple people are nearby.

ghosts.strength: None.
ghosts.weakness: Smudge sticks are more effective, preventing a hunt for longer.

ghosts.strength: Can mimic the abilities and traits of other ghosts.
ghosts.weakness: Will present Ghost Orbs as a secondary evidence.

ghosts.strength: Either Twin may start a hunt, though not at the same time.
ghosts.weakness: Will often interact with the environment at the same time.

ghosts.strength: Does not leave UV footprints after stepping in salt.
ghosts.weakness: Will become more active if it steps in salt.

ghosts.strength: Talking near the Yokai will anger it, increasing the chance to attack.
ghosts.weakness: Can only hear voices close to it during a hunt.

ghosts.strength: Has a stronger effect on sanity.
ghosts.weakness: Smudging the Yurei's ghost room will reduce how often it wanders.
